        Returns:

      • getMargins

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> getMargins()
        Calculates the part of the board where there are tiles.
        Returns:
        A list with 2 tupels, in the first: the min and max row margin, in the second: the min and max column margin.
